video_prompt: A bustling city street transforms into a tranquil park with a passing cyclist.
refined_video_prompt: Rapid urban movement of vehicles and pedestrians dynamically recedes and blurs. Buildings visibly shrink and dissolve, transitioning into expanding, lush greenery. Concrete structures soften and reshape into winding park paths. A lone cyclist pedals steadily across the evolving landscape, their figure moving fluidly as the entire environment actively shifts from city to natural park.
